Text: RE I am interested in seeing Global Energy Markets on EsourceKevin Thank you for your reply To answer the service is designed for multiple users over an intranet connetion The more users the lower the cost per user If its just for you we can work out a price thats reasonable for your budget Lets discuss this My phone number is Please call or reply by email to set up a conference call Thank you Regards Will Thurmond Emerging Markets Online Original Message From Hyatt Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Tuesday November AM To Subject RE I am interested in seeing Global Energy Markets on Esource i am still interested but the level of interest will depend on cost kh Original Message From Emerging Markets Online mailto Sent Tuesday November PM To Hyatt Kevin Subject RE I am interested in seeing Global Energy Markets on Esource Kevin Are you still interested in our Global Energy Markets service Please advise Thank ou Regards William Thurmond Original Message From Hyatt Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Thursday October AM To Schlesinger Judith Subject I am interested in seeing Energy News Live on Esource thanks Kevin Hyatt EB x This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Energy News Live This WeekEnergy News Live for Esource is available at demoesourcenewsasp Energy News LiveThis Week This week Energy News Live for Esourcewill take a tour of the key features available in the service Monday Analyst Services tour Tuesday Projects and News Databases Wednesday Energy News Live Regions Thursday Energy News Live Categories Friday Last day of Energy News Live trial subscription This is the final week of your trial subscription to Energy News Live for Esource Your subscription will expire June th To continue your subscription without interruption send an email now to Judith Schlesinger at Esource or by email Today we will look at one of the most useful features of Energy News Live Analyst Services range from uptodate graphs charts and data to financial information to updated news and competitor features Analyst Feature Trends and Graphs Energy News Live is updated every fifteen minutes with energy data and financial information The following is an example of the trends and graph data available Example IMAGE Energy Finance Results Another key analyst feature of Energy News Live is the Industry Financial Results database Use this database to get information on specific companies or find information on companies overseas Example IMAGE Analysis News Feeds Every fifteen minutes the Analysis news feeds provide up to date information on energy prices company strategies joint ventures MA activities licenses and industry trends Example IMAGE Competitor News Another useful feature of Energy News Live is a customized competitor tracking service We can customized this feature to track specific companies From the drop down menu you can select from any company you preselect In this example Kvaerner is featured IMAGE About Energy News Live Energy News Live for Intranets is a new service from Emerging Markets Online and is now available as a trial subscription to Esource Energy News Live aggregates feeds from a number of different sources so you dont have to Sources include Dow Jones Reuters Energy BBC and AFP In addition Energy News Live delivers energy news and data by global region and energy sector providing an added benefit of time savings and convenience Continue Your Subscription Without Delay From June th to June th Energy News Live will be available atdemoesourcenewsasp During this time you will have unlimited access to the service Your subscription will expire June th To continue your subscription without interruption send an email now to Judith Schlesinger at Esource or by email Emerging Markets
